name: Dirk williams cassowary commando
description: It’s the 1980’s, in a desperate moment, Dirk Williams, a badass Cassowary Commando must save the President of the United Poultry Lands, who has been taken hostage by a villain known as Hurk Silliams (durks evil cassowary cyborg twin) and trapped in a maze. Dirk must navigate the maze, taking out Hurk’s henchmen (cyborg chickens) and avoiding traps along the way.
